name: Postman Blue
description:
The web version is a little funky because of time restraints; the standalone is the recommended way to play! :)

Postman Blue is a fun and short puzzle platformer about a mailman whose decisions on his way to recipients determine whether or not he'll make it back... Feedback is greatly appreciated!

This game was developed for and submitted to the 2020 edition of VimJam, whose focus was collectables and theme, "There and Back".
